GET /zones/{zone_id}/firewall/waf/packag.description:
Fetches WAF rules in a WAF package.

**Note:** Applies only to the [previous version of WAF managed rules](https://developers.cloudflare.com/support/firewall/managed-rules-web-application-firewall-waf/understanding-waf-managed-rules-web-application-firewall/).

schema.description: The unique identifier of a WAF package.
The action/mode a rule has been overridden to perform.
The unique identifier of the rule group.
The page number of paginated results.
The number of rules per page.
The field used to sort returned rules.
The direction used to sort returned rules.
When set to `all`, all the search requirements must match. When set to `any`, only one of the search requirements has to match.
The public description of the WAF rule.
schema.example: SQL injection prevention for SELECT statements

PATCH /zones/{zone_id}/firewall/waf/pack.description:
Updates a WAF rule. You can only update the mode/action of the rule.

**Note:** Applies only to the [previous version of WAF managed rules](https://developers.cloudflare.com/support/firewall/managed-rules-web-application-firewall-waf/understanding-waf-managed-rules-web-application-firewall/).

schema.description: The unique identifier of a WAF package.
The unique identifier of a WAF package.

mode.description: The mode/action of the rule when triggered. You must use a value from the `allowed_modes` array of the current rule.
